name: A Game of 2
description:
A Game of 2 is a 2d puzzle game made during the Github GameOff 2022 game jam.

The theme of the game jam was cliché. The cliché used for A Game of 2 was "One Soul, Two Bodies".

Controls: Use the Arrow Keys on your keyboard to control the orbs.

The source code for the project can be found at https://github.com/pritalb/a-game-of-2 .
